程序包 ControlClass

类 CoreMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • ControlClass.CoreMethods
  • public class CoreMethods
extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      CoreMethods()  

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static void addUser​(java.lang.String username)
      addUser:used by the administrator to add a new user
      static void checkUser​(java.lang.String username)
      checkUser:used by administrator to check the current status of a specific user
      static void clearAllFines()
      clearAllFines: used by the administrator to clear the fines of all users.
      static void park​(int loc, InformationSystem system, User user, javax.swing.Timer timer)
      park:check the freespaces and if success, park a car, stop timer, record time and blink image
      static void payfine​(java.lang.String username)
      payfine: used by administrator to pay the fine for a specific user
      static void pickup​(int loc, InformationSystem system, User user, javax.swing.Timer timer)
      pickup: check the freespaces and if success, pick up a car, restart timer and blink image
      static void removeUser​(java.lang.String username)
      removeUser:used by the administrator to remove a old user.
      static void searchUnpaidUsers()
      searchUnpaidUsers:used by the administrator to print the list of users who has not paid the fine.
      static void swipeCard​(InformationSystem system, java.lang.String username, javax.swing.Timer timer)
      swipeCard: simulate the process that user swipe card on a senser.
      static void viewFreeSpace​(int loc, InformationSystem system)
      viewFreeSpace:check the freespace available, print output both in text and image,

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • swipeCard

        public static void swipeCard​(InformationSystem system,
                             java.lang.String username,
                             javax.swing.Timer timer)
        swipeCard: simulate the process that user swipe card on a senser. according to the current status of user(riding or not riding), determine to park scooter or pick up scooter
        参数:
        system -
        username -
        timer -
        从以下版本开始:
        JDK 1.6

      • pickup

        参数:

        user -
        timer -
        从以下版本开始:
